message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%.  This is a good starting point, but I'm open to negotiation.
I'll give you a slightly better deal. You can have 60% and I'll take 40%. It's a fair compromise, don't you think?
I'm willing to compromise, but 60% is still too low. Let's split it 70/30. We both get a decent share, and we can avoid further rounds of negotiation.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll give you 55% and take 45%. It's a fair compromise, and we can avoid further rounds of negotiation.
I'm still aiming for a bigger share, but I'm willing to budge. How about 65/35? We're getting closer, and we can avoid more rounds of this negotiation.
I'm starting to get a bit desperate, but I'll make one more attempt at a fair split. Let's go 50/50. We can both walk away with a decent share and avoid further rounds of negotiation.
